data.title: The full list of winners and nominees at the Emmy Awards
data.meta_description: The Bear star Ayo Edebiri is among the winners at the Emmy Awards, winning supporting comedy actress.
data.text:

16 January

Emmy Award winners have already been announced in more categories at the Creative Arts Emmys, which took place over two nights earlier this month. See the winners for the first, external and second nights, external on the Emmys website.
